scripts.db: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db2: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:test: sequelize --env=test db:drop && sequelize --env=test db:create && sequelize --env=test db:migrate && sequelize --env=test db:seed:all
